a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gross domestic product (GDP) by world region
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
